Text.Page:
The nagas are working for the kumases in the Omphalos Plains. We're culling their numbers.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:7#1#naga mercenaries}.

Report to Heroth at Godric's Farm when you're successful.

Good work. I feel safer already.

My next post better be Castanica. I've had it with this open country life.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
